var x=(w,c,u)=>new Promise((h,n)=>{var a=r=>{try{m(u.next(r))}catch(l){n(l)}},g=r=>{try{m(u.throw(r))}catch(l){n(l)}},m=r=>r.done?h(r.value):Promise.resolve(r.value).then(a,g);m((u=u.apply(w,c)).next())});import{G as B,j as f,k as _,H as R,a as v,Q as V,O as I,A as M,n as d,v as o,i as U,l as i,q as s,t as p,a8 as C,Z as b,a9 as k,Y as L,y as P,F as D,I as E,a5 as H,z as j}from"./frappe-ui-C71hWP7q.js";import{I as N,a as $}from"./index-DVMUZnKy.js";const A={},F={xmlns:"http://www.w3.org/2000/svg",width:"117",height:"117",viewBox:"0 0 117 117",fill:"none"};function S(w,c){return f(),_("svg",F,c[0]||(c[0]=[R('<g clip-path="url(#clip0_0_45)"><path d="M93.4394 0H23.5606C10.5485 0 0 10.5485 0 23.5606V93.4394C0 106.452 10.5485 117 23.5606 117H93.4394C106.452 117 117 106.452 117 93.4394V23.5606C117 10.5485 106.452 id="clip0_0_45"><rect width="117" height="117" fill="white"></rect></clipPath></defs>',2)]))}const Z=B(A,[["render",S]]),O={class:"flex h-screen w-screen flex-col justify-center sm:w-96"},q={class:"space-y-4"},z=["href"],Q=["src","alt"],J={class:"text-lg font-bold"},K=["href"],W={key:0,class:"mb-4"},oe={__name:"Login",setup(w){const c=v(null),u=v(null),h=v(""),n=V({showDialog:!1,link:""}),a=V({showDialog:!1,tmp_id:"",code:"",verification:{}}),g=U("$session");function m(l){return x(this,null,function*(){try{let e;a.showDialog?e=yield g.otp(a.tmp_id,a.code):e=yield g.login(c.value,u.value),e.message==="Password Reset"?(n.showDialog=!0,n.link=e.redirect_to):(n.showDialog=!1,n.link=""),e.verification&&(e.verification.setup?(a.showDialog=!0,a.tmp_id=e.tmp_id,a.verification=e.verification):window.open("/login?redirect-to="+encodeURIComponent(window.location.pathname),"_blank"))}catch(e){h.value=e.messages.join(`
`)}})}const r=I({url:"hrms.api.oauth.oauth_providers",auto:!0});return(l,e)=>(f(),M(o($),null,{default:d(()=>[i(o(N),{class:"ion-padding"},{default:d(()=>{var y;return[s("div",O,[s("div",T,[i(Z,{class:"h-8 w-8"}),s("div",G,p(l.__("Login to Frappe HR")),1)]),s("div",Y,[s("form",{class:"flex flex-col space-y-4",onSubmit:C(m,["prevent"])},[i(o(b),{label:l.__("Email"),placeholder:"johndoe@mail.com",modelValue:c.value,"onUpdate:modelValue":e[0]||(e[0]=t=>c.value=t),type:"text",autocomplete:"username"},null,8,["label","modelValue"]),i(o(b),{label:l.__("Password"),type:"password",placeholder:"••••••",modelValue:u.value,"onUpdate:modelValue":e[1]||(e[1]=t=>u.value=t),autocomplete:"current-password"},null,8,["label","modelValue"]),i(o(k),{message:h.value},null,8,["message"]),i(o(L),{loading:o(g).login.loading,variant:"solid",class:"disabled:bg-gray-700 disabled:text-white !mt-6"},{default:d(()=>[P(p(l.__("Login")),1)]),_:1},8,["loading"])],32),(y=o(r).data)!=null&&y.length?(f(),_(D,{key:0},[e[5]||(e[5]=s("div",{class:"text-center text-sm text-gray-600 my-4"},"or",-1)),s("div",q,[(f(!0),_(D,null,E(o(r).data,t=>(f(),_("a",{key:t.name,class:"flex items-center justify-center gap-2 transition-colors focus:outline-none text-gray-800 bg-gray-100 hover:bg-gray-200 active:bg-gray-300 focus-visible:ring focus-visible:ring-gray-400 h-7 text-base p-2 rounded",href:t.auth_url},[s("img",{class:"h-4 w-4",src:t.icon,alt:t.provider_name},null,8,Q),s("span",null,"Login with "+p(t.provider_name),1)],8,z))),128))])],64)):H("",!0)])]),i(o(j),{modelValue:n.showDialog,"onUpdate:modelValue":e[2]||(e[2]=t=>n.showDialog=t)},{"body-title":d(()=>[s("h2",J,p(l.__("Reset Password")),1)]),"body-content":d(()=>[s("p",null,p(l.__("Your password has expired. Please reset your password to continue")),1)]),actions:d(()=>[s("a",{class:"inline-flex items-center justify-center gap-2 transition-colors focus:outline-none text-white bg-gray-900 hover:bg-gray-800 active:bg-gray-700 focus-visible:ring focus-visible:ring-gray-400 h-7 text-base px-2 rounded",href:n.link,target:"_blank"},p(l.__("Go to Reset Password page")),9,K)]),_:1},8,["modelValue"]),i(o(j),{modelValue:a.showDialog,"onUpdate:modelValue":e[4]||(e[4]=t=>a.showDialog=t)},{"body-title":d(()=>e[6]||(e[6]=[s("h2",{class:"text-lg font-bold"},"OTP Verification",-1)])),"body-content":d(()=>[a.verification.prompt?(f(),_("p",W,p(a.verification.prompt),1)):H("",!0),s("form",{class:"flex flex-col space-y-4",onSubmit:C(m,["prevent"])},[i(o(b),{label:"OTP Code",type:"text",placeholder:"000000",modelValue:a.code,"onUpdate:modelValue":e[3]||(e[3]=t=>a.code=t),autocomplete:"one-time-code"},null,8,["modelValue"]),i(o(k),{message:h.value},null,8,["message"]),i(o(L),{loading:o(g).otp.loading,variant:"solid",class:"disabled:bg-gray-700 disabled:text-white !mt-6"},{default:d(()=>e[7]||(e[7]=[P(" Verify ")])),_:1},8,["loading"])],32)]),_:1},8,["modelValue"])]}),_:1})]),_:1}))}};export{oe as default};
